name: Conclave
task: jQuery plugins, responsive Bootsrap jade templates
description: This is a social network project for American schools and teachers.
Jade templates + SASS and LESS under NodeJS Express app.
The team consisted of me and NodeJS developer Alex.
We used oDesk and e-mail communication with Skype.

aboutProject: * [NodeJS with many modules such as Compass](http://nodejs.org)
aboutTeam: On this work i contacted with my main manager from **San Diego Calif.** The team consisted of me and NodeJS developer Alex. We worked in series: i received a design in PSD format, after i programmed html/css with Webstorm tool and LESS + SASS under Compass compiler. We used oDesk and e-mail communication with Skype.
myRole: This e-social network site based on NodeJS and Jade template engine also used SASS as main CSS preprocessor and i used my knowledge of LESS preprocessor also with Twitter Bootstrap as grid based CSS framework. When i worked with project's repo i used [GIT version control system](http://git-scm.com/about) and dedicated server on Linux. I programmed this project under my Mac with SSH port-forwarding techniques. I worked near 5 weeks with this project and developed Jade pages with many SASS code.
result: After 5 weeks i completed project and main goal was **converting inline CSS styles to SASS** under Twitter Bootstrap and completing JavaScript code.
> I would like to keep working with her as much as possible for future projects too.

aboutTeam: Our team included: I worked as Web Developer, 1 project manager, 1 Web designer, 1 Angular js Developer, 1 Python/Django Developer.
^We communicated via [Upwork](https://www.upwork.com/o/profiles/users/_~01ffe04a2db9f8b16a) and Skype, and also used e-mail communication.
myRole: The site based on Django and Jade template engine, Twitter Bootstrap as grid based CSS framework and LESS as main CSS preprocessor.
^As UI/UX Bootstrap consultant i disscused with Web designer design concept and developed design.
^Then i [programmed Jade(HTML) / LESS(CSS) with Webstorm tool](http://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm). Also i developed Django templates and helped Angular developer to develop angular application.

^When i worked with project's repo i used [GIT version control system](http://git-scm.com/about). My tool is [SourceTree](https://www.sourcetreeapp.com) for pushing and pulling code to repo on [GitLab](https://about.gitlab.com). I worked near 6 months with this project and developed many Jade pages with LESS code, Django templates and one part of Angular application.
* Search interface for internal flow documents
result: After 6 months i completed project and main goal was **developing design, coding Jade pages with LESS under Twitter Bootstrap, developing Django templates and Angular application.**
> I very liked what Anya have done!
>>During this project i improved my knowledge of Django template engine, Angular JS and increased Jade and LESS skills.
